author: jfclere
msg: fix 36030. Note that it requires /proc to be mounted.

author: chirino
msg: Allow the wrapper classes to be constructed with instanciated delegates.

author: tfischer
msg: - Added a method getXXX(connection) to retrieve associated objects in the n->1 direction, which uses the provided connection if a db hit is necessary

- Added a generator property torque.silentDbFetch, which is true by default. If set to false, the getXXX() methods without arguments will not access the db silently, but return null if the associated objects has not been read yet. Also, these methods do not throw a Torque exception any more if silentDbFetch is false.
- Fixed a few misplaced spaces and differences between Object.vm and ObjectWithManager.vm

author: sctemme
msg: Make ab negotiate the highest protocol version available. PR 33110

author: rich
msg: Two contributions from Carlin Rogers to address:
- http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-882 : ScopedServletUtils.getOuterRequest() does not handle an instance of MultipartRequestWrapper
